form.IN:
Primernik je
more
, presežnik pa
most
: glej posamezni gesli.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekje
many people or things
, so tam ljudje ali stvari v velikem številu.

seg.quote: ...the many brilliant speeches that had been made.
Many of the old people were blind.

sense.def:
Izraz
many
uporabljamo tudi v vprašanjih in trditvah o količini.

seg.quote: How many children has she got?
I used to get a lot of sweets. As many as I liked.

sense.def:
Izraz
a good many
ali
a great many
uporabljamo za zelo veliko število predmetov ali oseb.

seg.quote: The information has proved useful to a great many people.
